name: Nuclear Regulatory Commission
description: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission licenses and regulates civilian use of radioactive materials to protect public health and safety and the environment.

painPoints.point: Nuclear safety and licensing system modernization to improve efficiency and regulatory oversight
IT infrastructure modernization for regulatory data management and inspection systems
Cybersecurity enhancements for critical nuclear infrastructure protection
Regulatory data collection and analysis system improvements
Nuclear materials tracking and reporting system modernization
IT acquisition and management challenges including project delays, budget overruns, and need for improved oversight and mature acquisition practices affecting nuclear regulatory IT systems
